revised_title: The Development and Extinction of Doubly Refracting Structures in Crystalline Lenses
tldr: Sir David Brewster's research on the development and extinction of regular doubly refracting structures in the crystalline lenses of animals after death. He discovered these structures in various lenses and investigated their arrangement. His findings could lead to conclusions about the cause and cure of cataract.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vision Science
